statements: DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance_checks WHERE trade_id = 100 AND compliance_check_result = TRUE;
DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance_checks WHERE security = 'AAPL' AND timestamp < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM trading_activities WHERE trader_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM compliance_checks WHERE is_compliant = false;
DELETE FROM compliance_checks WHERE trade_id = (SELECT trade_id FROM trading_activities WHERE trader_name = 'John Doe' AND trade_amount > 1000.00);
DELETE FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_status = 'Pending' AND trade_id IN (SELECT trade_id FROM trades WHERE trade_price > 1000);
